responsibilities.desc: Revamped old websites using GatsbyJS, a ReactJS powered framework, sourced from Wordpress using GraphQL, and improves site’s speed and SEO with Hubspot chat system and analytics
Collaborated on building system UI’s for a portal system using ReactJS
Developed e-commerce food ordering website with Woocommerce
Liaised with SEO expert, designer, project manager, and CEO as needed
Managed websites and domains with Plesk Obsidian and performed regular updates on plugins and databases
Developed Wordpress websites using Divi or Elementor from a raw PSD to a functional mobile-friendly websites
Collaborated with designers to create clean interfaces and simple, intuitive interactions and experiences
Developed an internal project tracker app using VueJS and Firebase
Developed and maintained Wordpress websites specializing in booking, rentals, legal websites, and landing pages
Worked closely with senior developers and learned advanced project management skills
Developed reusable modules for Odoo/OpenERP using Python and XML
Created Odoo QWeb reports and rendered data visually
Collaborated on enhancing the system's UI/UX
